description:
#giantspider #dnd #terrain
Learn to make Spider Web Cocoon models for all your miniature 28mm tabletop games such as Dungeons and Dragons and Pathfinder. This easy craft will save you valuable time, so you have more hours to play the games you love. The materials to craft the cocoons are also cheap and easy to obtain so this project wonâ€™t break your budget. Bring a few crafting supplies and sit down with DM Scotty to begin your DIY crafting adventure. You can find the tools you need at my website ( http://www.thedmscraft.com/ ). So grab your gluegun and Go Forth and Craft.

MY WEBSITE: You can pick up the craft supplies you need while helping to improve this channel at no extra cost to you by visiting and my website and using the links. Thanks again and GO FORTH and CRAFT: http://www.thedmscraft.com/

STOCK UP FOR THIS CRAFT! (You help the channel with every purchase)

Surebonder Gluegun: https://amzn.to/2KB1ooa

Surebonder Nozzle Replacements: https://amzn.to/2M3npBG

Surebonder All-Temp Glue Sticks: https://amzn.to/2vu9LwR

Craft Paint Set (Basic Colors): https://amzn.to/2OlJvfg

Craft Paint Set (Best Sellers): https://amzn.to/2OMtkJ3

Craft Paintbrush Set: https://amzn.to/2vpkLvM

Model Magic air-dry clay: https://amzn.to/2pNawy5

White Pearl Craft Paint: https://amzn.to/2QKCF4h

Spider webbing and 30 spiders: https://amzn.to/2QJ5NZD

Cheap Sculpting Tool Set: https://amzn.to/2QH4cDy

Elmer's Glue-All Gallon: https://amzn.to/2ISM2w4

THE TABLETOP CRAFTERS GUILD SITE:
http://www.tabletopcraftersguild.com/

PATREON: Become a friend to the Craft and help me bring more content to the community by joining my Patreon. You will have access to exclusive DM Scotty content:  https://www.patreon.com/theDMsCraft?ty=h

FACEBOOK: Join The Tabletop Crafters Guild Facebook group for more crafts and camaraderie. 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/

TWITTER:  @TheDMsCraft

DISCLAIMER: This video and description contains affiliate links, which means that if you click on one of the product links, Iâ€™ll receive a small commission. This helps support the channel and allows me to continue to make videos like this. Thank you for the support!
